item.description:
Azucar Restaurant is Cuban quisine with a few Italian dishes thrown in. They offer Thursday night drink specials and Salsa dancing at 9:00pm - the manager said there would be some lessons involved if we wanted. Menu can be seen here: http://www.menupix.co...

We will be in a private room as long as we have 15 people or more. We will have two tables seating 12 people each. Not a lot of parking in the area - corner of Franklin Ave and South St. The restaurant name is pronounced ah-ZOO-ca (like a sneeze: Bless you!).

This restaurant was reccommended by one of our members, it is her favorite.

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: AZUCAR (CUBAN QUISINE) 6/26/08 7:00
